## Import Packages

```{r load packages, message = FALSE}

#install.packages("tidyverse")
#install.packages("here")
#install.packages("neonUtilities")

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(neonUtilities)

```

## NEON Data Products, Sites, and Dates

```{r set NEON conditions}

# Tick Pathogen Status
tick_pathogens <- "DP1.10092.001"

# Relative Humidity
relative_humidity <- "DP1.00098.001"

# Tick Abundance - drag cloth
tick_abundance <- "DP1.10093.001"

# Assigning two sites
my_sites <- c("HARV","DELA")

# Start date (as YYYY-MM)
start_date <- "2016-01"

# End date (as YYYY-MM)
end_date <- "2023-12"
```
